𓈖 𓆓 𓇛 𓅓 ⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉⲙ <> nectar 𓂜𓏱 •nec.muer™ "immortal" *neḱ- (“perish, disappear”) + *-tr̥h₂ (“overcoming”) <> necro

𓇛 ⲛⲟⲧⲉⲙ be sweet,pleasant ⇔ intimate (passion,joy)
𓇛 ⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉⲙ adj. sweet & naughty

𒉭 NUNUZ [109x] Nüsse nuts 𓇛 : eggs

𓇛 ⲛⲟⲧ ⋍ 𔒨 •nit (louse) eggs 𒉭 nuts

𓈖 𓆓 𓇛 𓅓 | well, hale, comfortable, joy | נֶחְמָד nekhmád > nice ⇔ nesciō (ignorant) ح م د ḥ m d comfort

𒉭𒄷 nus-ḫu 𓇛 𓉔 (a container) ⇔
